description:
The crew captures a strange alien who bites Meow, causing him, and eventually the crew, to turn into zombies. Life will never be the same.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Parfois, mourir n`est pas vivable, baby
Shinde mo Shinikirenai Toki mo Aru Jan yo
Sometimes You Can`t Live with Dying, Baby
死んでも死にきれない時もあるじゃんよ
